flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • a battery, a light bulb (if you would like to substitute another item that uses electrical power you may), a switch, an ammeter, and a resistor

parts.text: a battery, a light bulb (if you would like to substitute another item that uses electrical power you may), a switch, an ammeter, and a resistor

guide.summary: I am doing a project for Physical Science and I need to make my own circuit, using a battery, a switch, a light bulb, an ammeter and a resistor.
guide.title: RJ's 03.03 Circuit Assignment
